des:
Alex2MQTT bridges Alexa voice commands to an MQTT server, enabling you to control smart devices directly through a highly available and decentralized architecture. By eliminating reliance on a single point of failure, such as a central hub, Alex2MQTT provides a scalable and robust solution for smart home automation.

For setup instructions please visit out setup guide on https://alex2mqtt.stormysdream.club/


Key Features:
Voice Control via MQTT: Convert Alexa commands into MQTT messages that are sent to your server for device automation.

High Availability: Connect multiple devices simultaneously to a public MQTT server for increased reliability.

Extensible Design: Alex2MQTT is in its alpha phase, and upcoming updates will introduce advanced features for enhanced functionality.
